Player History
Drafted in 31st round, 485th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/11/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2015, off Gerald Henriquez (CHI)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/2/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/26/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/12/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 4/1/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 3/22/2020 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 5/16/2020...
